snippet.title: Lethal League trailer
snippet.description:
Lethal League is coming to Steam on August 27.

http://lethalleague.reptile-games.com

Lethal League is a competitive projectile fighting game where you have to hit an anti-gravity ball into the face of your opponent to win. The ball speeds up with every strike, up to explosively extreme velocities.

From the mad Candyman to the cyborg crocodile Latch, every character has their own style and abilities.

Play locally with friends, by yourself in the challenge mode or battle it out online.

-Highly competitive gameplay.
-High performance online GGPO multiplayer.
-Up to 4 players.
-Mad art.
-Banging beats by various artists.
-No weak shit.
